Package model

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
model.Wall
public class Wall extends Object
This is Wall class which handles most of the things happen to the wall.

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall(Rectangle drawArea, Point ballPos)
      This is a constructor to initialise some variables in Wall class. and create Player object.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - draw area to draw brick / player bar
      ballPos - center point of ball

  • Method Details

    • reward

      public void reward()
      This method is to give additional reward to user. The reward is give as follows: 1. If the user takes less than 6 minutes to finish the game and the number of brick broken is more than 120, reward additional 10 points. 2. If the user takes less than 3 minutes to finish the game and the number of brick broken is more than 50, reward additional 5 points. 3. If the user takes less than 1 minute to finish the game and the number of brick broken is more than 20, reward additional 3 points.

    • initialiseSpeed

      private void initialiseSpeed()
      This method is to set initial speed in x and y direction of ball.

    • makeBall

      private void makeBall(Point2D ballPos)
      This method is to make ball.
      Parameters:
      ballPos - center point of ball

    • move

      public void move()
      This method moves the player bar and ball.

    • findImpacts

      public void findImpacts()
      This method is to define impacts when the ball hits certain thing. The impacts are as followed: 1. If the ball hits the player bar, reverse the direction of the ball. 2. If the ball hits the brick, decrement the brick count and reward point. 3. If the ball hits the border of frame, reverse the direction of the ball. 4. If the player bar can't catch the ball and the ball goes beyond the frame, decrement ball count, set ballLost to true and deduct point.

    • impactWall

      private boolean impactWall()
      This method is to check if the brick hit is broken or not.
      Returns:
      state of brick (broken / not broken)

    • impactBorder

      private boolean impactBorder()
      This method is to check if the ball hits the border of the frame.
      Returns:
      is the ball hits the border of the frame

    • getBrickCount

      public int getBrickCount()
      This method is to return brick count to the calling method.
      Returns:
      brick count

    • setBrickCount

      public void setBrickCount(int brickCount)
      This method is to set brick count.
      Parameters:
      brickCount - number of brick

    • getBallCount

      public int getBallCount()
      This method is to return ball count to the calling method.
      Returns:
      number of ball left

    • isBallLost

      public boolean isBallLost()
      This method checks if the ball is lost.
      Returns:
      is the ball lost

    • ballReset

      public void ballReset()
      This method resets position of ball and player bar to the original position. It also reinitialises speed of ball and set ballLost to false.

    • wallReset

      public void wallReset()
      This method resets the wall. Brick is repaired. Brick count is restored. Ball count is restored.

    • ballEnd

      public boolean ballEnd()
      This method checks if the number of ball left is 0.
      Returns:
      whether the number of ball left is 0

    • isDone

      public boolean isDone()
      This method checks if the number of brick left is 0.
      Returns:
      whether the number of brick left is 0

      Parameters:
      s - speed of ball in x direction

      This method sets the speed of ball in y direction.
      Parameters:
      s - speed of ball in y direction

    • resetBallCount

      public void resetBallCount()
      This method resets the number of balls to 3.

    • getBricks

    • getScore

      This method returns score to the calling method.
      Returns:
      score

    • readHighScore

      public String readHighScore()
      This method read the highest score from a file if the highest score record file exists and return the string to the calling method. Otherwise, it return a string "Nobody:0" to the calling method.
      Returns:
      highest score record

    • checkScore

      public void checkScore()
      This method checks if the current score is higher than the score stored in the file. If current score is higher than the score in the file, prompt the user to input his / her name and write the new highest score record to the file.

    • getHighScore

      public String getHighScore()
      This method returns the highest score.
      Returns:
      the highest score

    • setScore

      public void setScore(int score)
      This method is used to set score (mainly used to testing purpose).
      Parameters:
      score - score obtained by user

    • getTimer

      public GameTimer getTimer()
      This method is used to return timer to the calling method (mainly used for testing purpose).
      Returns:
      timer which is used to calculate time taken by user to play the game

    • setBallLost

      public void setBallLost(boolean ballLost)
      This method is to set whether ball is lost (mainly used for testing purpose).
      Parameters:
      ballLost - whether ball is lost

    • setBallCount

      public void setBallCount(int ballCount)
      This method is to set ball count (mainly used for testing purpose).
      Parameters:
      ballCount - number of ball left
